messages.content: You are a helpful assistant.
What has the greatest effect on charges?
destroying a bridge or building
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if the investigator fails to defuse the bomb on time?
it explodes
You are a helpful assistant.
What might happen if the investigator fails to detonate the charges at the right time?
it fails to detonate at all
You are a helpful assistant.
What might happen if the investigator fails to detonate the charges with the desired effect?
the detonation fails to have the desired effect (either too great or too little)
You are a helpful assistant.
What might happen if the investigator fails a pushed roll while devising a method of delivery?
he or she devises the most bizarre method of delivering the explosive
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the primary purpose of Disguise skill?
To be used whenever you wish to appear to be someone other than whom you are.
You are a helpful assistant.
What are the two distinct aspects of Disguise skill?
Either you are trying to conceal your true identity or you are impersonating someone else.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is a regular difficulty in using the Disguise skill?
To convince strangers that you are who you say you are.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is a hard difficulty in using the Disguise skill?
To convince professionals in a face-to-face meeting that you are who you say you are.
You are a helpful assistant.
What tools may be used to enhance the Disguise skill?
Theatrical makeup, fake ID, and costume.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is a difficult task in convincing professionals that you are who you say you are?
Convincing professionals in a face-to-face meeting that you are who you say you are.
You are a helpful assistant.
Can you pass as a specific person in a face-to-face meeting with someone who knows the person being imitated?
No, this is beyond the scope of this skill.
You are a helpful assistant.
What can you do to confound the target in a disguise?
Overt exaggeration.
You are a helpful assistant.
How can you prepare for a disguise?
Undergoing a fully immersive and intensive preparation.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is an example of a disguise method that may indicate the need for a combined skill roll?
Passing as a bank employee to gain access to a bank vault.
You are a helpful assistant.
What are some possible consequences of failing a pushed roll in the game?
Being arrested; causing offence, leading to violence or criminal charges; finding that the person being imitated is wanted by a criminal gang who come looking for vengeance.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens to an insane investigator who fails a pushed roll?
The investigator no longer recognizes their own face in the mirror, even when the disguise is removed.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the name of the device that was invented in 1942, revolutionizing scuba diving?
Aqua-Lung
You are a helpful assistant.
What is a skill in the game that involves the use of diving equipment?
Diving
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the level of difficulty for the skill 'Opposing'?
Difficulty level
You are a helpful assistant.
What is considered regular difficulty in diving?
routine dives using correct and well-maintained equipment.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is considered hard difficulty in diving?
diving in dangerous conditions or with poorly maintained equipment.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is an example of hard difficulty in diving?
diving in dangerous conditions or with poorly maintained equipment.
You are a helpful assistant.
What does 'correct and well-maintained equipment' imply in regular difficulty?
it implies equipment that is suitable for the task.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is an example of pushing the limits of the equipment?
pushing the limits of the limits of the equipment is not directly supported by the text.
